title: EPA - Air Emission Sources - Petroleum Refineries, USA, 2007
name: EPA - Air Emission Sources - Petroleum Refineries, USA, 2007
description: This Dataset show the locations of many of the Petroleum refineries across the US and their Air Emission data from each refinery. Data was downloaded as a simple KML file without attribution. Data Source: EPAURL: http://www.epa.gov/air/emissions/where.htm
